name: Alien Spaceship Quest
description:
Get ready for an unique action sequence puzzle!

Awesome story featuring Human Captain, Frozojo Technician and you, the Greecik Buttonor!

Quest: press the maga-eletro-100 Button located at the center of ship

Chompers: a set of dangerous traps

Buttonor: specialized in Chompers Sequence and press button.

Objective:
1. Observe and figure out The Chomper Sequence!
2. Swipe left/right/up/down to help Greecik Buttonor reach maga-eletro-100 Button!
3. A handy Time-machine to go back time if Greecik Buttonor gets chompered, lasered, electrified, or drown in acid/lava!

Features:
★Awesome unique action sequence puzzle!
★Awesome first in the universe swipe control!
★Awesome special effects and 2 frame animation!
★Awesome chompers and repetitive spaceship interior!
★Awesome addictive action sequence puzzle!
★Awesome challenging action sequence puzzle!

★★★Free for 99 years only, hurry and get it now!★★★
Included bonus features: awesome pop-up ads!

HOW TO PLAY
When yellow light is on, swipe right to move
Reach the button to win
if died, tap retry at top right of screen
